frontMatter.title: Paynow Integration Part 2 - Getting Keys
frontMatter.summary: The first step to integrate Paynow into your app is getting keys. Without the keys you can't accept payments.

prev.title: How to be great at anything by Mark Manson
prev.summary: Sometimes your integration may not always work out of the box. Here are some tips to help you fix it.

next.title: Paynow Integration Part 3 - Installation
next.summary: After getting the keys the next stage is to install Paynow library or SDK.
